## Properties

| Property            | Attribute            | Description                            | Type              | Default                   |
| ------------------- | -------------------- | -------------------------------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------- |

| `device`            | --                   |                                        | `BluetoothDevice` | `null`                    |
| `disconnectedClass` | `disconnected-class` | The CSS class to use when disconnected | `string`          | `"microbit-disconnected"` |
